alert.note: Alert for Mason (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 12:29AM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Mason County through 115 AM CDT... At 1229 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles south of Streeter, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hedwigs Hill, Loyal Valley, Hilda and Us-87 Near The Mason- Gillespie County Line. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
